categories: Category:The Star Wars Sourcebook narrative fiction

nodes.text: The Briefing of Spacetrooper Platoon 243-XT is a short narrative story published in The Star Wars Sourcebook in 1987. Framed as a recording of Sergeant Clayton Balrog, it relates a briefing given to Spacetrooper Platoon 243-XT regarding a mission to capture the GrimDeath I. It was reprinted in the second edition of the book in 1994.
